Title: BAU CHANGES: April Reload Consolidated and Refresh Mat Table
Description:
As an APM, I want to see the Consolidated table updated in order to see all BAU changes according with the latest business docket (use the last version from this folder) --> Dockets

The consolidate table will need to be reloaded for:
  • Industry SubSegment
  • APP&A
  • Alliances
  • Mergers & Acquisitions
  • CEO&ES --> CONVER
  • Sustainability Services --> CONVER
  • CSGO
Impacted columns in FactOpportunityConsolidatedTextAux:
  • Alliances --> AlliancesDescriptionPercentageTxt, AlliancesDescriptionPercentageAmountTxt
  • APP&A --> AccentureSoftwareTxt  
  • Merger & Acquisitions --> MergersAcquisitionsTxt
  • Industry SubSegment --> IndustrySubSegmentCdTxt, IndustrySubSegmentCdTxt
  • CEO&ES --> CEOEnterpriseStrategyTxt
  • Sustainability Services --> SustainabilityServicesTxt
  • CSGO --> CSGOTxt
Impacted database object [2766_SalesDW]: 
  • Manual updated: DW.FactOpportunityConsolidatedTextAux
  • Refresh of Materialized views:  DWAccess.FactOpportunityConsolidatedTextAux_vw_Mat
  • DWR: DWR.CIPOpportunity_vw //DWR.CoreOpportunityExtract_vw // DWR.CoreOpportunityExtractCampaigns_vw //DWR.CoreOpportunityExtractDaily_vw // DWR.CoreOpportunityExtractME_vw // DWR.OpportunityConsolidatedText_vw // DWR.ProductFinancial_vw // DWR.SPE_AttributeMultiRowExtra_vw
Reload Scope: 
Consolidated: All FY's 

Query to Test: Folder
Acceptance Criteria:
1- When I open a SalesDW impacted database object, I see that the columns reflect the values that we have in the last business docket (Attributes)
2- When I open a Downstream object (Schema DWR). I see that the columns reflect the values that we have in the last business docket (Attributes)
3- When I open an impacted report, I see that the attribute values match with the last business docket.

Title: [SF] EPS - Resale - Update Address information in quote when Opportunity CR is changed
Description:
User Statement

As a Resale CPQ user, I want to get the address information in Quote automatically updated if new FC has been related after changing the Opportunity CR, so that I can have consistency with the Financial Customer information.

Pre-Conditions
  1. User needs to have an active CPQ access.
  2. Resale Opportunity and Quote have been created.
  3. Opportunity CR is changed to another having a different FC related.

Introduction

Nowadays, every time the Opportunity CR is changed to another, and the new one is related to a different FC, the address information from the new FC is not being updated on the Quote, which maintains the details of the previous FC related. This cause inconsistencies with the Sold To, Bill To and Ship To information between the ones on the Quote and the Financial Customer it´s related.
Impacts
  • Integration
    • No impact.
  • Data Conversion
    • No Impact.
References
Acceptance Criteria:
• Quote Address Information Section for Resale Quotes needs to be automatically updated every time the Opportunity CR is changed to another one:
    • All the following Sold To, Bill To and Ship To fields from this section, that are currently populated during quote creation and when Quote opportunity is changed, should now also be refreshed every time this type of update happens, matching their values with the respective fields from the parent FC: Name - Street - City - State - Postal Code – Country. Then, for Sold To, we also have ‘Sold To VAT’ to match FC Vat Registration Number.
    • The rest of the fields in these categories won´t be included in any logic so, will always maintain their values if any: Contact – Contact Email – Phone.
    • All the fields from this Address section should remain as editable for the user in case manual updates are needed in the future (as today).
    • The Refresh Logic should override all manual updates made by users for any of the scoped fields.
  • Account lookup field for Resale Quotes should be updated to be Read Only.

Fields from Quote

Fields to match from FC

Sold To Name

Account

Sold To Street

FC Street Address

Sold To City

FC City

Sold To State

FC State/Province

Sold To Postal Code

FC Postal Code

Sold To Country

FC Country/Location

Sold To VAT

Vat Registration Number

​Ship To Name

Account

Ship To Street

FC Street Address

Ship To City

FC City

Ship To State

FC State/Province

Ship To Postal Code

FC Postal Code

Ship To Country

FC Country/Location

Bill To Name

Account

Bill To Street

FC Street Address

Bill To City

FC City

Bill To State

FC State/Province

Bill To Postal Code

FC Postal Code

Bill To Country​

FC Country/Location

SORT: Include in the "Sales Contribution (Wins)" calculation the new column “Acquisition Related Sales Contribution $”
Description:
As an APM I want to add in the calculation of the existing "Sales Contribution (Wins)" (column AG) the new “Acquisition Related Sales Contribution $” (column AR).

Impacted Report / Tab:
SC&A - DTE Summary Sales Contribution Report / Summary 

Impacted SP:
[SOR].[spSCADTESalesContributionSummary]
[DWR].[spSCADTESalesContributionSummary]
 
Neil Requirement: I wanted to know the feasibility if we could include the Acquisition Related Sales Contribution $ in the Sales Contribution Wins total but we would not have display the opp details for the Acquisition related sales contribution to include in the other metrics in the Summary worksheet like Won CCI, Won ADR, Won ACV, etc.  we would need to calcuate these other metrics (won cci etc) without including the Acquisition related sales contribution.
Acceptance Criteria:
1- When I open the "SC&A - DTE Summary Sales Contribution Report" and click on "Summary" worksheet, I see that the "Sales Contribution (Wins)" (column AG) include in the calculation the value in the “Acquisition Related Sales Contribution $” (column AR).
2- The calculation of the related columns that use the "Sales Contribution (Wins)", is not affected.

Title: MMS CHANGES: New fields on "TechnologyAssessments" objects
Description:
As an APM, I want to add the following new fields to the "TechnologyAssesments" object. 

Object Name

Field Label

Field APi Name

Data Type

TechnologyAssessments__c

Industry Group

IndustryGroup__c

nvarchar(255)

Type

Type__c

nvarchar(255)

Potential Resale Size

PotentialResaleSize__c

numeric(18,0)

Total Size

TotalSize__c

numeric(18,0)


MMS Script attached on this User Story

Fields:

[IndustryGroup__c --> IndustryGroup 
[Type__c] --> Type 
[PotentialResaleSize__c] --> PotentialResaleSize 
[TotalSize__c] --> TotalSize 

Public table name:
  • MMSDELTA.TechnologyAssessments__c
SalesDW table name: 
  • DW.FactTechnologyAssessments
Queries:
SELECT IndustryGroup__c , Type__c, PotentialResaleSize__c, TotalSize__c
FROM [2766_SalesMgmtRptg_Public].MMSDELTA.TechnologyAssessments__c (NOLOCK)
WHERE IndustryGroup__c IS NOT NULL

SELECT IndustryGroupCd, Type, PotentialResaleSize, TotalSize
FROM [2766_SalesDW].DW.FactTechnologyAssessments (NOLOCK)
WHERE IndustryGroupCd IS NOT NULL
AND Datekey IN (SELECT Datekey--,
FROM [2766_SalesDW].DW.DimDate WITH (NOLOCK)
WHERE LastProcessingDateInd = 'y')
Acceptance Criteria:
1 - When I check MMSDELTA.TechnologyAssessments__c, I see new fields are created.
2 - When I check MMSDELTA.TechnologyAssessments__c, I see new fields with valid data.
3 - When I check DW.FactTechnologyAssessments, I see new fields are created.
4 - When I check DW.FactTechnologyAssessments, I see new fields with valid data.

Title: [ANG]: Project 6 POC: NBM Automation: Inclusion of a deep link to view the specific meeting agenda
Description:
The objective of this requirement is to provide the sales ops team another way of viewing the agenda.

A deep link [Sugg: formula field] needs to be crafted in the MMS NBM Meeting record page, which can be copy pasted into an email and when the recipients click the link it opens the NBM page but just the meeting which is being sent.

For Informational purposes, offering the user a different way to see the record.

Pre-Requisite for the landing page [NBM page] is it should by default be filtered by the respective meeting under the Meeting Agendas tab.
Acceptance Criteria:
• User should be able to navigate to the NBM Meeting.
  • User should be able to view the field/link that would be displayed which is used to redirect the user to the NBM page.
  • The landing page should open in a new tab under the Meeting Agendas title where the corresponding NBM Agenda is displayed (Meeting with its Opportunities).
  • It should by default be filtered by the corresponding meeting and no other filters should be displayed on the page.

Title: [CR] [SF] FE: Consent & Preferences Check report field detail- Exporting non-english characters value

Title: [Implementation] MMS Prod Checkout Data Issue
Description:
Background: This is a business ask, for some of our business users they are asked to provide some data from the dashboards for their end users however there is no way to filter out the test/MMS Prod data because they have global access. 

So for example, if a end user wants to know how many responses we have right now in Account Feedback, and I have global access, i have to filter for the MMS Prod accounts, get the count, then find the total numbers, and then manually subtract the MMS Prod Accounts from that total number to get an accurate count. 



Fix: 
  1. On global access, make sure to remove the filter on the Dashboard level and have it at the role/data level
    1. make sure to disable roll up data
  2. Create a new workflow to accommodate Manual Surveys
    1. If metadata is updated for response, check if Master Client Name has MMS Prod and production data /= test then mark it as test

Dev-3
Test-2
IPT-
Acceptance Criteria:
1. On global access, make sure to remove the filter on the Dashboard level and have it at the role/data level
    1. make sure to disable roll up data
  2. Create a new workflow to accommodate Manual Surveys
    1. If metadata is updated for response, check if Master Client Name has MMS Prod and production data /= test then mark it as test
  3. Users are able to toggle between Test/Prod data
    1. make sure the prod data doesn't include MMS Prod Checkout data

Title: Implementation of Project Median NPS- Dashboard updates
Description:
As a Project Feedback Dashboard back-end user I would like to see Median NPS individually instead of Standard NPS Calculation provided by Qualtrics.
Below are the high-level Business Requirements:

1.Show the Median NPS of project Cumulative NPSs, Instead of the Standard NPS calculation provided by Qualtrics
2. Median NPS widget should only include the Project NPSs that have at least 5 responses.
3. Median NPS widget should react to Accenture Org Dimensions Filter
4. Median NPS widget should have a rolling 12-month data (Future Sprint implementation)



Background: 

Current State - NPS Calculation are following the standard calculation using the LTR Score by Qualtrics.

Formula:
 Detractors-0-6, Passive-7-8, Promotors-9-10
[(No.of Promoters/Total no of response)- (No.of Detractors/Total no of response)] * 100

Ex: 
Here the calculation works as below [(4/5) -(1/5)] *100= (3/5) *100=3*20=60


Future State - NPS Calculation should follow the Project Median NPS as 50th percentile for each project. This Median NPS is then used more accurately represent data across the dashboards.

Here the Median will be calculated as cumulative of Project NPSs as shown below.



Solution:

The solution is to set up a new directory that stores and calculates Account Level NPS for each account as new surveys come in. See the PPT for the full solution details:

Project Median NPS.pptx
Recording:
Median NPS Handover-20240326_080350-Meeting Recording.mp4


1.Create a Project FY Counts Response Mailing List in the Directory with the Following Fields and Values: (SEE PPT FOR FULL DETAILS)

Name of the Dataset/Directory should be -[CS-001] Project NPS -Table Structure

CS-001 Represents the Id 






The below highlighted NPS widgets in the Project feedback survey Dashboard will be used Custom table as the Data source,
 and the Directory will serves as primary source of NPS Widgets and the  Project Feedback Survey will still be the primary source of other widgets and pages

Instead of using Stand NPS we need to use 50th percentile on this widgets and include the Project NPSs that have at least 5 response(Filter update)






Change the widget type to table currently it simple table

Dev-5
Test-3
IPT-
Acceptance Criteria:
Validate the NPS Widget above in both  Cross project and Delivery lead view are used Custom table as Data source
Validate the  Project Feedback Survey will still be the primary source of other widgets and pages
Validate the NPS widgets filter updates uses 50th Percentile
Validate the NPS Widget filter updates will have at least 5 response
Validate the changes to the Unlock filters as above
Validate the Project Result by account widget title change to Median NPS by Account
Validate in the Project Breakdown widget Master Account field is Remap to the Contract Code field.

Public SalesODS
DataBase Fields Type DataBase Fields Type
Global_Prospective_Client_Classification__c CreatedDate DATETIME FactGlobalProspectiveClientClassification CreatedDate DATETIME
Global_Prospective_Client_Classification__c LastModifiedDate DATETIME FactGlobalProspectiveClientClassification LastModifiedDate DATETIME
Global_Prospective_Client_Classification__c ActiveInd__c BIT FactGlobalProspectiveClientClassification ActiveInd NVARCHAR(1)

Query to test:
SELECT ActiveInd__c,CreatedDate,LastModifiedDate
FROM [2766_SalesMgmtRptg_Public].[MMSDELTA].[Global_Prospective_Client_Classification__c] (NOLOCK)

      • All the following Sold To, Bill To and Ship To fields from this section, that are currently populated during quote creation and when Quote opportunity is changed, should now also be refreshed every time this type of update happens, matching their values with the respective fields from the parent FC: Name - Street - City - State - Postal Code – Country. Then, for Sold To, we also have ‘Sold To VAT’ to match FC Vat Registration Number.
      • The rest of the fields in these categories won´t be included in any logic so, will always maintain their values if any: Contact – Contact Email – Phone.
      • All the fields from this Address section should remain as editable for the user in case manual updates are needed in the future (as today).
      • The Refresh Logic should override all manual updates made by users for any of the scoped fields.
    • Account lookup field for Resale Quotes should be updated to be Read Only.

Title: [AppOmni] Impersonation PS grants additional "Modify All" access
Description:
Summary
AppOmni team reported Impersonation PS has "Modify All" data that is granting additional accesses to users other than the impersonation itself. 
For this reason, the plan is to replace this PS by the use of the "Delegated Administration" concept.

Plan is apply this to a small group of users in OpsSupport for testing it and get UAT sign off to go with this to PRD.

sharing some links that may be helpful to proceed:
Define Delegate Administrators (salesforce.com)
Delegate Administrative Duties (salesforce.com) 

Important
Second link that provides "Duties" details, mention the need of using "user roles". MMS today does not use user roles. 
Case needed, create a single role in the role hierarchy named "MMS User" and assign it to couple users that we'll be using for the testing of "Delegate Admin" functionality.
Acceptance Criteria:
Old ADO reference
User Story 2395966: [AppOmni] Administrator can login as any user is enabled.

    Accenture Win/Loss Rate vs. a specified competitor. Accenture Wins $ (that include the specified competitor) / (Accenture Wins $ + Losses $ (that include the specified competitor)).     Accenture Win/Loss Rate vs. a specified competitor: Accenture Wins $ (that include the specified competitor) / (Accenture Wins $ + Losses $ (that include the specified competitor)). Title: [SF] Contacts - Update error message in Relationship Strength Estimator
Description:
As a contact administrator, I want to update the error message in the Relationship Strength Estimator to inform the reason for the error.  

Steps to reproduce the error:
  1. Open any non-c-level contact without email.
  2. Navigate to the Relationship Strength Estimator.
  3. Answer all the questions and click on Estimate.
  4. Click on Save Suggested Value.
  5. Error message "An unknown error occurred updating the contact data" appears.
This happens because email (a required field) is missing on the contact.  This error message should be modified to inform the reason for the error.
Acceptance Criteria: Currently, if any required field (other than Accenture Relationship Strength) is missing in a contact, and the user tries to estimate the Accenture Relationship Strength, a vague error message is displayed.  It should be modified to inform the reason for the error.

Title: [DC] Opp - Add Validation to 'Competitor (if Other)' field if value entered already exist in Competitor lookup or 'Competitor (if Other)' field
Description:
The following changes must be made:

 

1.       If Competitor field has “OTHERS” and if a user has entered in a value in the ‘Competitor (If Other)’ field that is an exact match in the ‘Competitor’ field (lookup field), then as part of conversion, we should delete the specific “OTHERS” competitor record that is a match (because for some opps, there may be multiple “OTHERS” competitors, so we need to make sure we are deleting the correct one) and also add a new competitor record to the Opportunity record if one doesn’t already exist for that competitor (meaning, add a competitor record for those values of Competitor (If Other) if that doesn’t exist in the competitor line item and is part of the Competitor look up field)

 

[ex: If Competitor field has “OTHERS” and Competitor (If Other) field has “Deloitte” value, then we need to delete the “OTHERS” competitor record that is a match (match with ‘Deloitte’). Also, add a new “Deloitte” Competitor record to the Opportunity if it doesn’t already exist for that Competitor and is part of the Competitor look up field].

 

2.       If Competitor field has “OTHERS” and if a user has entered in a value in the ‘Competitor (If Other)’ field that is an exact match that's already in the Competitor (if Other) field, then as part of conversion, we should delete the duplicate record such that only one record remains. 

[ex: If Competitor field has “OTHERS” and Competitor (If Other) field has “Deloitte” value and there are 2 or more such records, then we need to keep one record as it is and delete the rest of the records].

3.       Scope: All active deals


Trigger/Message: Off
Acceptance Criteria: ​As a part of this requirement, we need to add validation on Competitor (If Other) field on the Competitor object.

Title: [SF]NBM Automation-Project 5- Updated information in Value Column- Part 3- backend logic implementation- 1
Description:
This user story is for backend logic implementation of the below-mentioned requirement.

Main requirement- 

 

As per the new requirement, we are changing the data or information that will be shown in the “Value” column of the output table. Here we are identifying fields which will be displayable in the “Value” column. The main user story was divided into two parts- 1 and 2. As part of Part -1 , we are showing those values in Value column which are part of the validation comparison. As part of part 2- We are taking those fields which are not a part of validation comparison directly but are mentioned in the excel file and we have to show those values as well in Value column.  The final output table will have “Value” column which will show the label of the field along with its value.

Those fields are highlighted in the excel attached in amber color with this note "Not in April release".

Title: [POC] [SF] M&C Project 2 - FE: Processed tag for the file
Description:
To conduct POC to identify the processed file in the S3 bucket. For the requirement context, please refer to the story attached to User Story 359903: [SF] M&C Project 2 - FE: Opportunity – Creation/Updating of Client/Lead Contact in MMS DB

In this POC we need to find an approach to add a tag in the original file present in the S3 bucket to identify if the file is already processed or not.

Possible Approach -> Moving or deleting the processed file from the S3 bucket 
As S3 bucket does not support any API to Rename or move the file directly in S3 bucket.
Workaround - creating a copy of an existing file with a new name and deleting the original one. 
We can create a copy of the original file with a new name - like filename_processed and delete the original file from the S3 bucket.
Acceptance Criteria: To finalize an approach to add a tag in the original file present in the S3 bucket to identify if the file is already processed or not.

Title: Please Ignore[ANG]: Project 6 POC: NBM Automation: Inclusion of a deep link to view the specific meeting agenda -Part 2
Description:
The objective of this requirement is to provide the sales ops team another way of viewing the agenda.

A deep link [Sugg: formula field] needs to be crafted in the MMS NBM Meeting record page, which can be copy pasted into an email and when the recipients click the link it opens the NBM page but just the meeting which is being sent.

For Informational purposes, offering the user a different way to see the record.

Pre-Requisite for the landing page [NBM page] is it should by default be filtered by the respective meeting under the Meeting Agendas tab.
Acceptance Criteria:
• User should be able to navigate to the NBM Meeting.
  • User should be able to view the field/link that would be displayed which is used to redirect the user to the NBM page.
  • The landing page should open in a new tab under the Meeting Agendas title where the corresponding NBM Agenda is displayed (Meeting with its Opportunities).
  • It should by default be filtered by the corresponding meeting and no other filters should be displayed on the page.

Title: [SF]: NBM Automation Project 6 - Phase 2: Create Preview Functionality in NBM Meeting.
Description:
The objective of this requirement is to create Preview Functionality in NBM Meeting. 

There are 2 options to Preview - First by preview button and second by Populate preview invitation when click on “Send Invitation” button.
Acceptance Criteria:
Preview Button -
  1. In the Email preview Functionality, first create a button to preview the invitation. 
  2. When user click on the preview button then he will be able to see the preview page of the mail. 
  3. button should be beside the “Send Meeting Agenda” button.
  4. On the preview page, user will see a picture of the email that would be sent according to the fields displayed below. 




Preview Popup Box -  

  1. when user click on the “Send Meeting Agenda” button then Populate preview popup box just like a below screenshot where user can preview the email. below Preview popup box is a sample image only.
  2. Popup box fields will be same as mentioned in the below screenshot.
  3. popup box will have 2 buttons - Cancel and Send.
  4. After click on the send button, Email will be sent to the respective attendees.
  5. On the preview popup box, user will see a picture of the email that would be sent according to the fields.


 
first Preview popup box is a sample image only. We have to follow this design. second screenshot is the Actual preview page image of the email.
Note: - 
  • In any case, the invitation won't allow to be modified from the preview. To do that, users must modify corresponding fields in MMS.
  • the invitation Will be sent once user confirms it in preview section Confirm button.
  • We also required a Cancel button in case user wants to modify something before sending the email.
  • We also required a Cancel button in case user wants to modify something before sending the email.

Title: [SF]: NBM Automation Project 6 - Phase 2: Create a new "Send Email button" in NBM Meeting.
Description:
The objective of this requirement is to create Send Email button in NBM Meeting. 

After click on the "Send Email Agenda" button, Sales Ops team will be able to send the Email to the respective attendees.
Acceptance Criteria:
1. Create a button “Send Email Agenda”. 
  2. When user click on the “Send Email Agenda” button then user will be able to send email to the respective attendees (after the confirmation on the preview email).
  3. Standard message (your email has been sent successfully) will display once Email is sent.

  4. To send the email, it is mandatory to add at least 1 attendee otherwise it will show disabled.

  5. if Agenda Email was previously sent and no modifications in the email fields have been done, then display Alert first, when click on “Send Email Agenda”. Two buttons will be displayed in Alert box Cancel and Confirm. Once user confirms then, second Preview popup box will display, which will have cancel and Send button. Once click on the send button, email will be sent to the respective attendees.
  6. Alert text mentioned below in the screenshot.
  7. Create a field and placed in layout. Last Email Timestamp, (Date &Time).                                                                                            a. this field will be updated with the date and time every time the email is sent.

Title: [SF]: NBM Automation Project 6 - Phase 2: Create a new Email Template in NBM Meeting.
Description:
The objective of this requirement is to create Email Template in NBM Meeting.

Currently, Sales Operations team has a no of shared mailboxes. From the shared mailboxes, they send email to Accenture team with Agenda for NBM Meeting. We need to build the communication flow in MMS. We want to leverage the possibility of sending emails on behalf of any of the shared mailboxes of the client groups. 

Pre-Condition:  User should have clicked on Send Email Agenda button in MMS to send an email to the corresponding recipients.

 This will be applicable for all NBM Meetings.
Acceptance Criteria:
Email Template should be as per below attached image: 

  1. Subject: From MMS: Subject (will contain NBM meeting title after record creation).
  2. Sender: Shared mailboxes per Client Group.
  3. To: From MMS: Attendees from the Related list and email address included in Additional To (Internal/Admin) field.
  4. CC: From MMS: CC (Internal/Admin) + sender field.
  5. Add Label "Highly Confidential\Do Not Forward".
  6. Email Title: (in bold) from MMS, NBM Meeting Title +Meeting Start.
  7. Email Body: From MMS: Body field. 
  8. Digital NBM Agenda Link: From MMS: NBM Agenda field [link: See Agenda in NBM page].
  9. Link to NBM Agenda Report: From MMS: NBM Meeting Agenda field [link: NBM Scheduled Opportunities].
  10. Greetings: From MMS: Greetings field.
  11. Signature: From MMS: Signature field according to the Sender. (They should be mapped to the Sender)

Title: [POC][SF]: NBM Automation Project 6 -Phase 2: By Add Attendees Functionality - Related List
Description:
The objective of this requirement is to easily add attendees into the NBM Meeting.

 By clicking on Add Attendees button, user will se the Add Attendees page where they can select any of the opportunities scheduled. When the Opportunity is selected, the corresponding Sales Member Team will be displayed (name + Opp. role) will be displayed in a different box where the user can select multiple of them to be added.

Another section to select other MMS Users as attendees of the NBM Meeting will be displayed.

When saving, the selected attendees will be visible on the Related List

This will be applicable for all NBM Meetings.
Acceptance Criteria:
• When user click on the Add Attendees button in NBM meeting page, then Add Attendees page will open. the button should be in the Attendees related list.
  • In the Add attendees page, User should be able to see a dropdown menu labeled "Available Scheduled Opportunities".
  • Once user select the scheduled opportunity then sales team box will open.
  • In the box, A prelist of all sales Team members along with their Opportunity Role will be displayed so users can select who they consider to be added as attendee.
  • user can multiselect the attendees from the list.
  • If a user wants to add other MMS user, then user will have another field to include individual attendees from all MMS Users. In the name field, User can search the attendee’s name and add to them in “other MMS attendees” section. (Except Users from Sales Team related to the Opportunities above*)
  • After user selects the required attendees, when clicking on “Save”, the selected attendees Will appear in standard related list.

Title: [SF]NBM Automation-Project 5- Updated information in Value Column- Part 3- backend logic implementation-2

Title: [SF] :NBM Automation-Project 5- Validations -Phase2- CCI [Condition 2]
Description: This user story deals with CCI validation[Condition 2]. Please refer attached doc for more information.
Acceptance Criteria:
Condition 2: FOR MC Global Classification <> Diamond  

IF  

Every single SG in Opportunity is just Manage Services = BPMS or IMS or AMS 

OR  

(Opportunity is a bundle meaning it has at least one SG = (BMPS or IMS or AMS) AND has at least one SG = (CO or SC or SI)) 

AND  

CCI% Excluding Billable Expenses – Target Margin (%) >= 400 BPS 

End IF 

 

show an ALERT 

 

1 BPS= 100% 

 

Message: 

ALERT: Be aware that you are performing below targets, the variance between CCI Excluding Billable Expense and Target Margin is over 400 Bps. Please review your pricing solution and be prepared to explain the reasons why this is happening during your approval process. Remember that a deviation above targets at opportunity level might imply an up-class and additional approvals on deviation. More information Sales Excellence Sales Ops - Reference: Accenture Opportunity Classification Guidelines (OCG)  

(https://kxdocuments.accenture.com/contribution/5f249430-5fb3-44ca-8c69-2853036e0dbb)

Title: UI [Figma]: Competitive Intelligence- User selection and others
Description:
Pre-Requisite:  User should have access to the website

User should be able to log into the website and be able to select from the filter options and view the details
Acceptance Criteria:
User is logged into the website: 

User should be able to view  the following in the header Account Planning with the tagline powered by Sales Excellence

The below dropdown filters should be visible:
Client

More Filters: 
Client Snapshot
Sales Triggers
Client Spend
Competitor Landscape
Technology Landscape
Socialytics
Sales Performance Analyzer
Industry Insights
Contract Database

with a Generate button.

User should be able to search for a client in the Client search box.

User should be able to select multiple options from the dropdown options in any one of the filter options and click on Generate button.

The data will be displayed based on selection.

A textbox of the selected options with a Close mark should be displayed below the Results section. If the user clicks on the cross mark for that particular textbox, the details for that section should  be removed form the screen.

Note: 1. If the user click on the cross mark in client textbox, the screen will be reset [similar to landing screen]
           2. Generate button will be enable only if any one of the filters in More Filters section is selected.

User should be able to copy the results using the Copy option.

User should be able to click on Download Results link and the details should be downloaded into a word document.

User should be able to click on Reset button and the page should be reset with all the selections removed. [similar to landing screen]

The Resources section below each data generated will indicate the data source for that data.

Ex: Draup, CAPIQ

Title: [SF] NBM Automation- Project 6-Phase 2: Generate new section to allow  Sales Operations Team to define email details​
Description:
Currently, NBM Meeting Agenda is sent via email by copying details manually from various sources which is highly time consuming for both the Sales Ops and Deal Teams. 

 

As a part of the solution to automate the email agenda, we will be introducing a new section Invitation Details on NBM Meeting page the collective information from the field details on this section, will be a part of the email sent as the NBM meeting agenda. 

  

This will be applicable for all NBM Meetings.
Acceptance Criteria:
A new section ‘Email Details’ needs to be created in the NBM Meeting layout above the Attendees Related list. 

 It should contain below fields: 

  • Sender 

  • Additional To (Internal/Admin)
  • CC (Internal/Admin)

  • Body  

  • Signature 

  • Subject  

  • Closure

Field Details are as per below:

  • Lightning Layout should be updated to Dynamic Forms (in order to do not show emails details fields at the creation except Sender)

  • Sender should be present at record creation under the Email Details section. It should be filtered by Meeting Type in real time.-TBD with dev team
  • Sender is editable and when sender is edited/creation and saved, signature should be automatically updated. Rest all is default text.
  • Sender is a mandatory field at the layout level.

  • Subject should come from title automatically after record creation. Sync happens only at record creation. 
  • There will be no connection between title and subject after record creation. They are independent of each other. 
  • When title is edited by the user, subject will remain unaffected.  
  • Subject- [Length:255] 

  • Additional To (Internal/Admin): Email addresses (apart from attendees) that will receive the email agenda in "To"
  • CC (Internal/Admin): Email addresses (apart from attendees) that will receive the email agenda in "CC"
  • Length-32768 
  • Field to concatenate email addresses 

  • Body: Length-32768

Default Text[Body]:
REMINDERS:

  • Please make sure your opportunities are accurate, QA reviewed where applicable and fully submitted prior to the call. You use the Approval Discussion Preparation Checklist as guidance.
  • Please make sure you have reviewed and leveraged relevant content from the Accenture Reinvention Console (Solutions, Assets, Industry/Function/Service narratives etc.) while shaping your opportunity presented in the NBM Meeting. Please code your opportunity accordingly in MMS (for the "how-to" please refer to the New Recommended Solution Tablet & Asset Usage Page in MMS.
  • Please join the call only in your designated time slot.


  • All the above fields are accessible and editable by MMS Admins and System Admin.
  • For read mms admin, all the fields in NBM Meeting layout should remain read only.
  • It should be not visible for CT and Read CT.[only the fields in email Details section]


To send emails on behalf of the user, it needs to be configured in Organization Wide Addresses.  

Display Name and Email Address corresponding to each client group should be provided to be listed. Once done, verification mail will be sent to the shared mailbox. 

User having access to mailbox should click on the link and status will change to verified in SF. 

We need to use them as a sender for email communication, based on the senders there will be different signatures [TBD by Business].


To track the mapping of the sender vs the email address and display name and signature, custom object should be created. 

Naming convention and name of the Object tbd by dev

Field/Object Level permissions for custom object : Editable for System admin and the respective Permission Set and Read only for MMS Admin and Read MMS Admin

New Permissions Set needs to be created to make it editable for applicable users. [To verify with Security Team]


List of Emails for data team: https://ts.accenture.com/:x:/r/sites/NBMCompass-MMSDev/Shared%20Documents/NBM-Sales%20Ops%20Optimization/Project%206%20Documents/SAles%20Operations%20Email%20Address.xlsx?d=wf67a2e1050194334a4b8eb588f9175bd&csf=1&web=1&e=Ee5vRV

User should be able to click on NBM Meeting and select any one of the NBM Meetings. 

NBM Meeting should be opened, and user should be able to navigate to Email Details section. 

The above-mentioned fields should be present. 







 

Pending from business: 

  1. Complete List of emails  

  2. body [by default], greetings [by default]

 Note: Few details are pending from Business and the story will be updated accordingly as and when we receive information on the same.
            This story is subjected to changes, until all requirements are finalized from business.

Title: [SF] EPS CPQ - Remove Quote Expiry Validation
Description:
User Statement 

As a Resale CPQ user, I want to remove Quote Expiry Validation, so that I can have a better workflow while quoting.


Pre-Conditions
  1. User needs to have an active CPQ access.
  2. Resale Quote is created.
  3. Quote Expiry Date is in the past.

Impacts

  • Data Conversion
    • No impact.

  • Integration
    • No impact.

Introduction


As currently we have the ‘Quote has Expired’ Informational Message along with Generate Document Button visibility behavior for Expired Quotes, the Expired Quote Validation Rule has become unnecessary, considering its goal only was to prevent users from Printing PDF, and we are already covering that with the first two. In addition to that, there are several backend processes being stopped nowadays if the validation is active:

  • Updating ESD on quote fails, if changing Sales Capture on Opportunity.
  • Calculations are not updated, if changing Opportunity Type of Resale.
  • Opportunity Deal Description not getting updated in quote.
  • Displaying Refresh Fx button and Msg fails if month changed.
  • Quotes Synchronization if there is already an expired Primary quote already synched to the same Opp.
Acceptance Criteria:
• ‘Expired Quote’ validation rule must be deactivated.
  • ‘Quote has Expired’ Informational Message along with Generate Document button visibility behavior should remain as usual.
  • Users should be able to update their quotes if they have expired but, they shouldn´t be able to print the PDF.

Title: Implementation of Project Median NPS- CS-001 Mailing List Creation
Description:
As a Project Feedback Dashboard back-end user I would like to see Median NPS individually instead of Standard NPS Calculation provided by Qualtrics.
Below are the high-level Business Requirements:

1.Show the Median NPS of project Cumulative NPSs, Instead of the Standard NPS calculation provided by Qualtrics
2. Median NPS widget should only include the Project NPSs that have at least 5 responses.
3. Median NPS widget should react to Accenture Org Dimensions Filter
4. Median NPS widget should have a rolling 12-month data (Future Sprint implementation)


Background: 

Current State - NPS Calculation are following the standard calculation using the LTR Score by Qualtrics.

Formula:
 Detractors-0-6, Passive-7-8, Promotors-9-10
[(No.of Promoters/Total no of response)- (No.of Detractors/Total no of response)] * 100

Ex: 
Here the calculation works as below [(4/5) -(1/5)] *100= (3/5) *100=3*20=60


Future State - NPS Calculation should follow the Project Median NPS as 50th percentile for each project. This Median NPS is then used more accurately represent data across the dashboards.

Here the Median will be calculated as cumulative of Project NPSs as shown below.



Solution:

The solution is to set up a new directory (Custom table) that stores and calculates project Level NPS for each account as new surveys come in. See the PPT for the full solution details:

Project Median NPS.pptx
Recording:
Median NPS Handover-20240326_080350-Meeting Recording.mp4


1.Create a Mailing List in the Directory with the Following Fields and Values: (SEE PPT FOR FULL DETAILS)

Directory: 
  • [CS] Custom Tables - Staging: for dev/staging version
  • [CS] Custom Tables - Production: for production version
Suggested Mailing List Name: [CS-001] Project NPS


This table will be used as a Data source of the project Feedback Dashboard and the Directory will serves as primary source of NPS Widgets and the  Project Feedback Survey will still be the primary source of other widgets and pages as shown below.



**Please note that these fields are the suggested fields. If you found any field that's required for the solution to work, feel free to add it.



Additional Suggestions:
  1. Make the Account CS-CIO Service Account (qualtricsimpl) the owner of the Mailing List.
  2. Share the Mailing List to MMS.CS.DevTeam group/folder.

Dev-1
Test-1
IPT-

Title: DOWNSTREAM REQUEST: New view for 'Asset Recommendation' -- Mallika´s request
Description:
As an APM, I want to create a new view per Jee´s request. 

The asset recommendation view should take the selected Solution Table and map it to the Asset Mapping table.

New view name:
  • [2766_SalesDW].[DWR].[AssetRecommendation_vw]
This should include 5 fields:
  • SolutionTabletKey
  • AssetTabletMappingKey
  • SolutionTabletAssetDesc
  • RecommendedAssetDescription
  • LastModifiedDate
Query:

SELECT DISTINCT
DTA.SolutionTabletKey,
DTA.AssetTabletMappingKey,
DST.SolutionTabletAssetDesc,
DSTA.SolutionTabletAssetDesc AS RecommendedAssetDescription
-- ADD LastModifiedDate from DTA
FROM [2766_SalesDW].[DW].[DimAssettabletmapping] DTA (NOLOCK)
LEFT JOIN [2766_SalesDW].DW.DimSolutionTablet DST
ON DTA.SolutionTabletKey = DST.SolutionTabletKey
LEFT JOIN [2766_SalesDW].DW.DimSolutionTablet DSTA
ON DTA.Assets = DSTA.Id
WHERE DTA.SolutionTabletKey NOT IN (-1)
AND DTA.ActiveInd = 'Y'
AND DST.ActiveInd = 'Y'
AND DSTA.ActiveInd = 'Y'
ORDER BY 1, 2, 4

Query for testing:

SELECT *
FROM [2766_SalesDW].[DWR].[AssetRecommendation_vw] (NOLOCK)
Acceptance Criteria:
1 - When I check [2766_SalesDW].[DWR].[AssetRecommendation_vw], i see the view has been created
2 - When I check [2766_SalesDW].[DWR].[AssetRecommendation_vw], I see that it has same # of record as [2766_SalesDW].[DW].[DimAssettabletmapping] & [2766_SalesMgmtRptg_Public].[MMSDELTA].[Assettabletmapping__c]

Title: [Test] EPS CPQ - Remove Quote Expiry Validation
Description:
User Statement 

As a Resale CPQ user, I want to remove Quote Expiry Validation, so that I can have a better workflow while quoting.


Pre-Conditions
  1. User needs to have an active CPQ access.
  2. Resale Quote is created.
  3. Quote Expiry Date is in the past.

Impacts

  • Data Conversion
    • No impact.

  • Integration
    • No impact.

Introduction


As currently we have the ‘Quote has Expired’ Informational Message along with Generate Document Button visibility behavior for Expired Quotes, the Expired Quote Validation Rule has become unnecessary, considering its goal only was to prevent users from Printing PDF, and we are already covering that with the first two. In addition to that, there are several backend processes being stopped nowadays if the validation is active:

  • Updating ESD on quote fails, if changing Sales Capture on Opportunity.
  • Calculations are not updated, if changing Opportunity Type of Resale.
  • Opportunity Deal Description not getting updated in quote.
  • Displaying Refresh Fx button and Msg fails if month changed.
  • Quotes Synchronization if there is already an expired Primary quote already synched to the same Opp.
Acceptance Criteria:
• ‘Expired Quote’ validation rule must be deactivated.
  • ‘Quote has Expired’ Informational Message along with Generate Document button visibility behavior should remain as usual.
  • Users should be able to update their quotes if they have expired but, they shouldn´t be able to print the PDF.

Title: New view ins_CommonProjectWMUAttributes
Description:
Create a new view in the Insights zone that joins and filters the Common Project to WMU relationship table and the WMU Attributes table.

The view will remove sensitive data, eliminate non Master Indicator records and join the two tables so users can quickly locate Common Project WMU attributes.

The view should be based of this code:
select distinct RW.CommonProjectId, WMUA.WorkManagementUnitId, WMUA.AttributeCd, WMUA.ContentValueDesc
from `prd-65343-datalake-bd-88394358.mme_2613.workmanagementunitattribute` WMUA
join `prd-65343-datalake-bd-88394358.mme_2613.relationshipworkmanagementunittocommonproject` RW
  on WMUA.WorkManagementUnitId = RW.WorkManagementUnitId
  and RW.MasterInd = 1
Acceptance Criteria:
New view created, the data returned by an unfiltered selection in the view is the exact same data returned by the script:
select distinct RW.CommonProjectId, WMUA.WorkManagementUnitId, WMUA.AttributeCd, WMUA.ContentValueDesc
from `prd-65343-datalake-bd-88394358.mme_2613.workmanagementunitattribute` WMUA
join `prd-65343-datalake-bd-88394358.mme_2613.relationshipworkmanagementunittocommonproject` RW
  on WMUA.WorkManagementUnitId = RW.WorkManagementUnitId
  and RW.MasterInd = 1

Title: [SOD] Update section name on Final Response File layout
Description:
Update to "Reason for not harvesting"


AS a Pursuit Services user

I WANT TO see updated the wording for the section and field on 'Final Response File' record page from 'Reason for not scrubbing' to 'Reason for not harvesting' 

SO THAT I can see the information accurate

 

1) On the record page of the 'final response file' object, in the details tab there is the 'Reason for not scrubbing' section and the 'Reason for not Harvesting' field which should be modified.


Object: Final Response File (FinalResponseFile__c)

Field: Reason for not Harvesting (ReasonNotHarvesting__c)


  • Modify the Label of the field "Reason for not Harvesting" to "Reason for not harvesting", only change the Capital Letter “H” to lowercase “h” in the word harvesting.

 Steps:

 

  1. Go to Setup and click on Object Manager.
  2. Go to “Final Response File” (FinalResponseFile__c) Object and click on Fields & Relationships.
  3. Go to ' Reason for not Harvesting' (ReasonNotHarvesting__c) field and click on Edit button.
  4. In the field label, edit the word Reason for not Harvesting by changing the Capital letter H to lowercase h.
  5. And click on Save.



2) Currently on the Lightning Record Page in the details section there is a section called Reason for not scrubbing and the name of this section should be updated to Reason for not harvesting.

Steps:

  1. Go to Setup and click on Object Manager.
  2. Go to “Final Response File” (FinalResponseFile__c) Object and click on Lightning Record Page.
  3. click on “Final Response File” Lightning Record Page and click on Edit button.
  4. Go to Page> Field Section and search Reason for not scrubbing section.
  5. Select Reason for not scrubbing section and in the label field change "Reason for not scrubbing" to "Reason for not harvesting". 
  6. And click on Save.
Acceptance Criteria: On the Final Response File page in the Details tab, you should display update for the section and the Field "Reason for not harvesting".

Title: DATA WAREHOUSE: CSGOs - Cloud FF conversion V2
Description:
As an APM, I want to perform the CSGOs - CLOUD FF conversion.

Post MMS Conver: FILE

Scope: DateKey BETWEEN 20230907 and 20240402
Deals: All Deals

Impacted Tables:
DW.FactOpportunityAttributes --> Conversion
DWAccess.OpportunityAttributesDetail_vw
DWAccess.OpportunityAttributesDetail_vw_Mat --> Refresh
DWR.OpportunityAttributesDetail_vw --> Regression Test
DWR.OpportunityAttributesDetailME_vw --> Regression Test
DWR.SPE_AttributeMultiRowExtra_vw --> Regression Test
DW.FactOpportunityConsolidatedTextAux --> Reload
DWAccess.FactOpportunityConsolidatedTextAux_vw
DWAccess.FactOpportunityConsolidatedTextAux_vw_Mat --> Refresh



Queries to test:

-- Verifico que no vengan PCT mayores a 100
SELECT SUM(OldAttributePct)
,SUM(NewAttributePct)
FROM [2766_SalesDW].[release].DocketCloudFF_R2421 FOA(NOLOCK)
GROUP BY OpportunityID
HAVING SUM(OldAttributePct) > 100
OR SUM(NewAttributePct) > 100




--- Verifico si hay Opps impactadas con < 100 y > 100
SELECT FOA.DateKey
,FOA.OpportunityId
,SUM(AttributePct) SUMPCT
,SUM(FOA.AttributeLocalAmt) SUMAMT
INTO ##ImpactedOppsSUM
FROM [2766_SalesDW].DW.FactOpportunityAttributes FOA(NOLOCK)-- CONVERTED TABLE
INNER JOIN [2766_SalesDW].DW.DimAttributes DA ON FOA.AttributeKey = DA.AttributeKey AND DA.ActiveInd = 'y'
WHERE AttributeTypeNm = 'Cross Service Group Offering'
AND AttributeLevel1Desc = 'Cloud'
AND FOA.DateKey BETWEEN 20230907 and 20240402
AND FOA.OpportunityId IN (  --- De aca saco las Opps impactadas
SELECT OpportunityId
FROM [2766_SalesDW].[release].DocketCloudFF_R2421
)

GROUP BY FOA.DateKey ,FOA.OpportunityId


SELECT *
FROM ##ImpactedOppsSUM
WHERE SUMPCT > 100

SELECT *
INTO ##MayoresA100
FROM ##ImpactedOppsSUM
WHERE SUMPCT > 100




/*

DROP TABLE ##ImpactedOppsSUM
DROP TABLE ##MayoresA100

*/

-----------------------------------------------------


--- ME quedo con las OPPS convertidas
--- Save the converted OPPS

SELECT FOA.DateKey, FOA.OpportunityId, DA.AttributeCd, DA.AttributeDesc, FOA.AttributeLocalAmt, FOA.AttributePct, FOA.CreateUserId
INTO ##OppsConverted
FROM [2766_SalesDW].DW.FactOpportunityAttributes FOA(NOLOCK)-- CONVERTED TABLE
INNER JOIN [2766_SalesDW].DW.DimAttributes DA ON FOA.AttributeKey = DA.AttributeKey AND DA.ActiveInd = 'y'
WHERE AttributeTypeNm = 'Cross Service Group Offering'
AND AttributeLevel1Desc = 'Cloud'
AND FOA.DateKey BETWEEN 20230907 and 20240402
AND FOA.OpportunityId IN (  --- De aca saco las Opps impactadas
SELECT OpportunityId
FROM [2766_SalesDW].release.DocketCloudFF_R2421
)


/*

DROP TABLE ##OppsConverted

*/


-- ME quedo con el BKP convertido
--- Save the bkp opps
SELECT FOA.DateKey, FOA.OpportunityId, DA.AttributeCd, DA.AttributeDesc, FOA.AttributeLocalAmt, FOA.AttributePct, FOA.CreateUserId
INTO ##OppsBKP
FROM  [2766_SalesMgmtRptg_Backup].[Backup].[DWFactOpportunityAttributes_20240405_R2421_FY24]FOA (NOLOCK) -- BKP TABLE
INNER JOIN [2766_SalesDW].DW.DimAttributes DA ON FOA.AttributeKey = DA.AttributeKey AND DA.ActiveInd ='y'
WHERE AttributeTypeNm = 'Cross Service Group Offering'
AND AttributeLevel1Desc = 'Cloud'
AND FOA.DateKey BETWEEN 20230907 and 20240402
AND FOA.OpportunityId IN (  --- De aca saco las Opps impactadas
SELECT OpportunityId
FROM [2766_SalesDW].release.DocketCloudFF_R2421
)


/*

DROP TABLE ##OppsBKP

*/


--- Verifico cual tiene mayor cnatidad de opps
--- El convertido tiene que ser mayor ya que tiene ADD nuevos attriubutos
--- Verify counts -> converted opps must have more records

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM (
SELECT DateKey, OpportunityId,SUM(AttributeLocalAmt) SUMAMT
FROM ##OppsBKP
GROUP BY DateKey, OpportunityId
) BKP

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM (
SELECT DateKey, OpportunityId, SUM(AttributeLocalAmt) SUMAMT
FROM ##OppsConverted
GROUP BY DateKey, OpportunityId
) Conver


SELECT Conver.DateKey, Conver.OpportunityId, Conver.SUMAMT ConverAMT, BKP.SUMAMT BkpAMT, Conver.SUMPCT ConverPCT, BKP.SUMPCT BkpPCT
INTO ##GrupedWithConver
FROM (
SELECT DateKey, OpportunityId, SUM(AttributeLocalAmt) SUMAMT, SUM(AttributePct) SUMPCT
FROM ##OppsConverted
GROUP BY DateKey, OpportunityId
) Conver
LEFT JOIN (
SELECT DateKey, OpportunityId,SUM(AttributeLocalAmt) SUMAMT, SUM(AttributePct) SUMPCT
FROM ##OppsBKP
GROUP BY DateKey, OpportunityId
) BKP
ON Conver.DateKey = BKP.DateKey AND Conver.OpportunityId = BKP.OpportunityId

/*

DROP TABLE ##GrupedWithConver

*/



--- La diferencia teiene que ser minima porque esta calculado por regla de 3
--- The difference must be min

SELECT SUM(BkpAMT) AMT_PreConver, SUM(ConverAMT) AMT_PostConver, SUM(BkpAMT) - SUM(ConverAMT) diff
FROM ##GrupedWithConver
WHERE BkpAMT is not null



--- No deberia quedar ninguno mayor a 100
--- Must not be pct > 100 ... 101 or 102 are accepted

SELECT *
FROM ##GrupedWithConver
WHERE BkpAMT is NOT null
AND ConverPCT > 100
ORDER BY DateKey desc

--- Estan todos al 100, porque se agregan
SELECT *
FROM ##GrupedWithConver
WHERE BkpAMT is NOT null

--- Verify that the diff be small
SELECT *, BkpAMT - ConverAMT diff
FROM ##GrupedWithConver
WHERE BkpAMT <> ConverAMT
AND BkpAMT is not null
ORDER BY 7



----------------------------------------------------
--- Veo especificamente una Opp que este > 100
--- Recordar cambiar docket y tablas de referencia (bkp y fact)

DECLARE @Opp int;
DECLARE @datekey nvarchar(8);

SET @opp = 11911153;
SET @datekey =20240229 ;

---- Docket
SELECT 'Docket'
SELECT *
FROM [2766_SalesDW].[release].DocketCloudFF_R2421 FOA (NOLOCK)
WHERE OpportunityID = @opp

--- Antes
SELECT 'Pre Conver'
SELECT FOA.DateKey,  FOA.OpportunityId, DA.AttributeCd,DA.AttributeDesc, FOA.AttributePct, FOA.AttributeLocalAmt, FOA.CreateUserId
FROM  [2766_SalesMgmtRptg_Backup].[Backup].[DWFactOpportunityAttributes_20240405_R2421_FY24] FOA (NOLOCK) -- BKP TABLE
INNER JOIN [2766_SalesDW].DW.DimAttributes DA ON FOA.AttributeKey = DA.AttributeKey  AND DA.ActiveInd = 'y'
WHERE AttributeTypeNm = 'Cross Service Group Offering'
AND AttributeLevel1Desc = 'Cloud'
AND FOA.DateKey IN (@datekey)
AND FOA.OpportunityId IN (@opp)
ORDER BY 1, 2, 3



--- Despues
SELECT 'Post Conver'
SELECT FOA.DateKey, FOA.OpportunityId, DA.AttributeCd,DA.AttributeDesc, FOA.AttributePct, FOA.AttributeLocalAmt, FOA.CreateUserId
FROM [2766_SalesDW].[DW].FactOpportunityAttributes FOA (NOLOCK) -- CONVERTED TABLE
INNER JOIN [2766_SalesDW].DW.DimAttributes DA ON FOA.AttributeKey = DA.AttributeKey  AND DA.ActiveInd = 'y'
WHERE AttributeTypeNm = 'Cross Service Group Offering'
AND AttributeLevel1Desc = 'Cloud'
AND FOA.DateKey IN (@datekey)
AND FOA.OpportunityId IN (@opp)
ORDER BY 1, 2, 3
Acceptance Criteria:
1. When I see the DW.FactOpportunityAttributes object, I see that the conversion was performed as it the FF says. 
  2. When I see the DW.FactOpportunityAttributes object, I see that the LocalAMT converted matches with the CSGOs - CLOUD backup.
  3. When I see the DWAccess.OpportunityAttributesDetail_vw_Mat object, I see that the impacted opps match with the FactOpportunityAttributes.
  4. When I see the DW.FactOpportunityConsolidatedTextAux object, I see that the impacted opps match with the FactOpportunityAttributes.
  5. When I see the DWAccess.FactOpportunityConsolidatedTextAux_vw_Mat object, I see that the impacted opps match with the FactOpportunityConsolidatedTextAux.

Title: Text iQ - Implement Topic Model of Account into Project
Description:
Background: Right now, in Engage we have two different topic models that we are using for Account and Project Feedback. If you take a look the Account one has 2 layers vs. Project only has one. This story is for us to implement the Account Topic Model into Project. However, once we do so we need to update the topic model to be more relevant for Project. For example, right now in Account Feedback there is a question about skills - this question is not in Project Feedback so we would have to remove/disconnect that node in the topic model and replace it with another node. 


Apply the topic model from Account to Project for all questions except for Skills, since the topic model from Account questions match the ones from Project for all questions except for Skills. Please apply the new topic model for that, which will be given by the PO team once completed. 

For the Account questions that don't apply to project - do not apply them (Ease of doing Business) 


Few Notes:
  • Check the coverage percentage of the model
  • Check rebuild time in our release communication --> what are we anticipating for people on the dashboard, let Tiffanee know as well since she handles release communications. 
  • Make sure the count is accurate from the skills POC to the new one** Added the screen shot below for reference
  • Make sure the updates are made in the dashboard as well, the sentiment topics are listed there.  
    • check on the questions pages on the dashboard - Overall Satisfaction: Comment Topics widget 




Proposed Skills Model:











Dev - 2
Test - 3
IPT -
Acceptance Criteria:
Apply the topic model from Account to Project for all questions except for Skills,

Apply the new topic model for skills 


Few Notes:
  • Check the coverage percentage of the model
  • Time and Communicate the rebuild time --> what are we anticipating for people on the dashboard, let Tiffanee know as well since she handles release communications. 
  • Make sure the count is accurate from the skills POC to the new one** Added the screen shot below for reference
  • Make sure the updates are made in the dashboard as well, the sentiment topics are listed there.  
    • check on the questions pages on the dashboard - Overall Satisfaction: Comment Topics widget

  • 2766_SalesMgmtRptg_Archive
    • [DW].[FactBDActivity]

Title: [TEST] Create Validation Rule for Title field for Contacts and Leads Objects
Description:
US
Currently we find some records with the Title field empty. We note that this field is required at layout level, that means that users could create Contacts and Leads without the Title field, when the records are created by backend.

Its expected that with a new validation rule we cannot still create Contacts and Leads, with Title = null.
Acceptance Criteria:
1. When I create a Contact or Lead via Back-End it is expected that the field Title be required.
    2. If I try to create a Contact or Lead with the Title field empty cannot be created.
    3. It is expected that an error message appears (Chapter 2)
    4. This validation rule should apply for all the profiles that can create Contacts and Leads.

Title: [SF] TechDebt - Improvements to the logic of the CRMLead__c field of the Campaign Member object
Description:
Improvements to the logic of the CRMLead__c field of the Campaign Member object:

 

-Add Util Constants for role description, and trigger/method names to use in queries and exception log creation.

 

-Improve the performance of Roles queries, replacing OR operator by a set of strings.


- Add a filter for campaign dates, logic should consider campaigns starting in FY22 (9/1/2021).

 

-Add filter for the record types of campaigns involved in the logic (Email/Event/OCM/Other).

 

These changes will be applied in CampaignMemberTriggerHelper & RoleTriggerHelper apex classes.
Acceptance Criteria:
-The code enhancement will be made for the field CRMLead__c
-This field is located in the Campaign Member object
-Add filter for the record types of campaigns involved in the logic (Email/Event/OCM/Other).
- Add a filter for campaign dates, logic should consider campaigns starting in FY22 (9/1/2021).

Title: [SF] Create Validation Rule for Title field for Contacts and Leads Objects
Description:
US
Currently we find some records with the Title field empty. We note that this field is required at layout level, that means that users could create Contacts and Leads without the Title field, when the records are created by backend.

Its expected that with a new validation rule we cannot still create Contacts and Leads, with Title = null.
Acceptance Criteria:
1. When I create a Contact or Lead via Back-End it is expected that the field Title be required.
    2. If I try to create a Contact or Lead with the Title field empty cannot be created.
    3. It is expected that an error message appears (Chapter 2)
    4. This validation rule should apply for all the profiles that can create Contacts and Leads.

Title: SORT: Improvements: Automate the current Avanade/Workday process

2- When I open the database, I see that the values in the [2766_SalesDW].DW.FactAvanadeAcnSalesCredit are successfully uploaded.

Title: UI [Figma]: Competitive Intelligence- Site Feedback
Description:
User should be able to click on Site Feedback button and a popup should appear with questions as per attached.

A Submit Feedback button must be present upon clicking Site Feedback submitted message should appear at the top of the page.
Acceptance Criteria:
User is logged into the website: 

User should be able to click on About in the side panel of the homepage.
User should be able to click on it and should be able to view the following tabs:

  1. Global Sales Excellence
  2. GEN AI Delivery Leads
  3. ML Engineering
  4. Data Engineering
  5. UI/UX
  • User should be able to verify that Site Feedback button is present in the About screen
  •  Submit Site Feedback : In popup it should be placed in the left hand corner of the popup.
  • Share your thoughts on how we can improve CAL Assist! We love to hear from you. text should be present
  • It should contain the below fields as per attached.
  • Only Describe your feedback field is mandatory
  • A Cross mark should be included at the top right corner of the popup, clicking on which the popup is closed and user reverts to Home screen.
  • In attach screenshot, only jpeg, png and gif formats are allowed.
  • User should fill the details in Describe your feedback textbox and click on Submit Feedback button.
  • Site Feedback submitted message appears on top. 
  • If the user tries to attach any other file apart from mentioned formats the below error message should appear:

    "Error: Unsupported File Type. Please upload a JPG, PNG, or GIF file for your screenshot"

Title: [Tech Debt - SF] Migrating Approvers By Stage Object Workflow Rules to Flow Builder - Part 2
Description:
We need to move 7 workflows to Flows. The workflows are:

  • Approver By Stage - Approved Set To False
  • Approver By Stage - Approved Set To True
  • Approver By Stage - Decision Default To Reviewer
  • Back Approver Record to Non Documented Manual RecordType
  • Back Approver Record to Non Documented OCT RecordType

Title: [SF]NBM Automation-Project 5- Validations -Phase2- Responsible Delivery Entity
Description: This user story deals with Responsible Delivery Entity. Please refer attached doc for more information.
Acceptance Criteria:
Field Name- Responsible Delivery Entity

Context: RDE is calculated based on SSG + Opportunity attributes selection. Sales Team might tag the opportunity correctly, but it can give a wrong RDE value. This value can be corrected by selecting the appropriated SSG and Attributes. But even after correcting the SSG and opportunity attributes, the value of RDE remains unsuitable or wrong, in this case, the team has to contact Sales Ops team and raise this issue with them. Sales Ops team then will contact RDE leads (the wrong one and the right one) to verify and once they have the final agreement on which RDE to use, an evidence is uploaded and then the Sales Ops uses the field RDE overwrite button to change the RDE (in Admin section).

 

Label- Default Responsible Delivery Entity

Api Name- ResponsibleEntityNm__c

  1. Condition 1- If Responsible Delivery Entity Override = “” and Default Responsible Delivery Entity <>”” and stage is < 2 then show a Best Practice.

Message: Best Practice: Review the Responsible Delivery Entity on your opportunity for accuracy. Modify the Attributes and/or Sub Service Groups on the opportunity if the RDE needs to be updated.  A solution review should be conducted before Stage 2 with the appropriate delivery entity. Contact the Sales Operations team for help if needed.

Title: [TEST] - Opportunity - Checkout Page - Like / Dislike Feature for Recommendations Section
Description: User story: [SF] Opportunity - Checkout Page - Like _Dislike Feature for Recommendations Section - 540901.docx
Acceptance Criteria:
Each recommendation should have a smiley face and sad face, indicating like vs. dislike. 
  • When a user has selected the smiley face (i.e., liked a recommendation), the smiley face should be displayed in blue. When a user has NOT selected the smiley face, the smiley face should be displayed in grey. 
  • When a user has selected the sad face (i.e., disliked a recommendation), the sad face should be displayed in blue. When a user has NOT selected the sad face, the sad face should be displayed in grey.

Acceptance Criteria:
Each recommendation should have a smiley face and sad face, indicating like vs. dislike. 
  • When a user has selected the smiley face (i.e., liked a recommendation), the smiley face should be displayed in blue. When a user has NOT selected the smiley face, the smiley face should be displayed in grey. 
  • When a user has selected the sad face (i.e., disliked a recommendation), the sad face should be displayed in blue. When a user has NOT selected the sad face, the sad face should be displayed in grey.

Title: Irrelevant image responses fix
Description:

Title: UAT feedback: Turnover Context identification
Description:
Created this US to track issues highlighted by business(Anne-Marie) regarding turnover context identification.

As part of US work on the turnover ambiguous word.

  • Turnover Context identification- Make bot identify turnover context in query and generate response accordingly.

This worked in most instances and the tool understood the difference between the different types of turnover. However, when asking for annual turnover, it still seems to default to answering with a response related to revenue rather than our turnover statistics.

Prompt: Please provide our annual turnover for the last three years.

Answer: We can confirm that our annual revenue over the last three years has exceeded €xxx. However, it is important to note that we do not break down our work into specific services or products. Additionally, we can confirm that in 2022 alone, over $72.2 billion of our total revenue was generated from cloud-based products and services, similar in nature to what the client is requiring.
Acceptance Criteria: Change the existing prompt to achieve this context identification for 'turnover'.

Title: Update/Add Metadata to each Proposal- STG
Description:
As a content owner, I need to make sure that the proposals are tagged with the correct information so I can prioritize them in the search. The following metadata will be needed: CSGGroupCd (single value field), IndustryOfferingCd (multi-value field), IndustrySubSegmentCd (multi-value field), AllianceCd (multi-value field)

Implementation Details: 
For each proposal loaded in the vector db, ensure that the following fields are included:
CSGGroupCd (single value field)
IndustryOfferingCd (multi value field)
IndustrySubSegmentCd(multi value field)
Alliance(multi value field)

 

Using the OpportunityId which is part of the Proposal name, extract the OpportunityId
Call the MMS Endpoint https://mms-api.ciostage.accenture.com/stage/Opportunity-service/Opportunity('11334223’)
From the response body , write the values in each column as defined in the API Endpoint Details attached
Reference documents like fact sheets  should have the value “Priority”
Acceptance Criteria: All proposals should have Metadata values

Title: [TEST] [CR] - Opportunity - Duplicate Opportunity Field - Clear out Field when duplicate Opportunity is re-opened.
Description:
Currently the Duplicate Opportunity field in the Closed - Duplicate conclude modal remains populated with the previous selection when an opportunity is re-opened and then submitted to Closed - Duplicate stage again, see screenshot below for reference.

i.e: if an opportunity is submitted and approved to be in stage Closed -  Duplicate and the User selects in the conclude modal an opportunity called "Specialty Lines Extension" to populate the "Duplicate Opportunity" field and then this opportunity is re-opened meaning that the stage changed to something like 0A  and  it's submitted again to be in stage Closed - Duplicate the User is going to see in the Closed - Duplicate modal the "Duplicate Opportunity" field prepopulated with  "Specialty Lines Extension".



The business is asking for the Duplicate opportunity field in the closed duplicate modal to be cleared out when the opportunity was re-opened, so the User has to select an opportunity again if it wants to populate the "Duplicate Opportunity" field again.
Note: make sure that the cleared out it's also applied to the "Duplicate Opportunity" fields in the Opportunity page and in the win loss page
Acceptance Criteria: Duplicate Opportunity field gets cleared out after an opportunity is re-opened.

Title: Data Patrol to get the plans where there's a mismatch (or missing responses) between MMS and Qualtrics
Description: Create a data patrol to identify if the data of the responses don't match in MMS and Qualtrics
Acceptance Criteria:
Let's discuss please in the next Triage call on 4/8.
We need to have a process that runs on the back-end (frequency to be defined), that enables us to identify when there are different count of responses between MMS and Qualtrics.
Normally the missing responses are in Qualtrics, but in this case we also need to consider the time that the sync between the 2 tools take (I understand within 24 hours for manual surveys, every 1 hour for electronic depending on the "batch" size).

Title: [SF] Tech-Debt - EPS - CPQ | Splitting Quote Page by record type
Description:
Introduction

Currently we have only one Page for quotes, the same for both businesses. This involves more unnecessary processing and visibility behaviors, making it difficult to maintain and it´s more likely to have bugs/errors.

The idea of this requirement is to Split the quote page into 2 different pages, assigned by record type: One for Resale and another for Security.

This will make the page maintenance much easier. 

Will reduce the unnecessary processing and behaviors.

Implementing new requirements for both businesses will be easier and more secure. 


Impacts
  • Data Conversion
    • No impact.
  • Integration
    • No impact.
Acceptance Criteria:
• 2 Quote Lightning Pages are now available, assigned by record types: One for Resale and another for Security.
  • Quote Pages for both record types work accordingly to the respective business process.
    • Visibility behaviors.
    • Messages.
    • Buttons and fields.

Title: MMS CHANGES: TabletAssetTransaction & Assetrecommendation - Regression Test
Description:
General Description:

This User Story is a regression test of the following tables with its respective applicable fields:
  • MMSDELTA.TabletAssetTransaction__c
    • 'AssetTabletName__c’
  • MMSDELTA.AssetRecommendation__c
    • 'TabletAssetTransaction__c'
    • 'OpportunityID__c'
All these fields should come with data. Actually, there are some NULL fields, and this is not ok.

Just FYI - Counts between Public & SalesDW on TabletAssetTransaction - They

Queries:

SELECT '# of rows should be aligned.'

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [2766_SalesMgmtRptg_Public].MMSDELTA.TabletAssetTransaction__c (NOLOCK)
--WHERE AssetTabletName__c IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [2766_SalesDW].DW.FactTabletAssetTransaction (NOLOCK)
WHERE Datekey = 20240403 -- Change to applicable Datekey

SELECT '# of rows should be aligned and be 0'

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [2766_SalesMgmtRptg_Public].MMSDELTA.TabletAssetTransaction__c (NOLOCK)
WHERE AssetTabletName__c IS NULL

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [2766_SalesDW].DW.FactTabletAssetTransaction (NOLOCK)
WHERE Datekey = 20240403 -- Change Datekey
AND SolutionTabletKey = -1 -- This should show 0

--------------------------------------------

SELECT '# of rows should be aligned.'

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [2766_SalesMgmtRptg_Public].MMSDELTA.AssetRecommendation__c (NOLOCK)
WHERE OpportunityID__c IS NOT NULL
OR TabletAssetsTransaction__c IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [2766_SalesDW].DW.FactAssetRecommendation
WHERE Datekey = 20240403 -- Change to applicable Datekey

SELECT 'Here we should see no information'

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [2766_SalesMgmtRptg_Public].MMSDELTA.AssetRecommendation__c (NOLOCK)
WHERE OpportunityID__c IS NULL
OR TabletAssetsTransaction__c IS NULL
Acceptance Criteria: 1 - When I check

Title: DOWNSTREAM REQUEST: New DWR - RAIChecklistResponseDaily for DataLake
Description:
As an APM, I want to create a new view for Analytics team.

General Description:

This will be consumed from Datalake in order to extract the last datekey information from RAIChecklistResponse information.

New view name:
  • [2766_SalesDW].DWR.RAIChecklistResponseDaily_vw
This new view should include the last datekey from the following table:

Source:
  • [2766_SalesDW].DW.FactRAIChecklistResponse
Query:
SELECT *
FROM [2766_SalesDW].DWR.RAIChecklistResponseDaily_vw

-- Below query should have same information

SELECT *
FROM [2766_SalesDW].DW.FactRAIChecklistResponse
WHERE DateKey IN
(SELECT DateKey
FROM [2766_SalesDW].DW.DimDate
WHERE LastProcessingDateInd = 'Y'
)
Acceptance Criteria:
1 - When I check [2766_SalesDW].DWR.RAIChecklistResponseDaily_vw, I see that new table was created
2 - When I check [2766_SalesDW].DWR.RAIChecklistResponseDaily_vw, I see valid data.
3 - When I compare [2766_SalesDW].DWR.RAIChecklistResponseDaily_vw with its source including last Datekey, I see same # of rows.

Title: DOWNSTREAM REQUEST: Create a new DWR views to Sales Excellence COE Analytics Team
Description:
As an APM, I want to create new DWR views in ODS for different objects.

General Description:
Currently the Sales Excellence COE Analytics team would need to bring the last datekey available for the following tables:

  • [2766_SalesDW].DWAccess.SorApprovalDetails_vw_Mat
  • [2766_SalesDW].DWAccess.OpportunityExtraDetails_vw_Mat
  • [2766_SalesDW].DW.FactOpportunityConsolidatedTextAux_vw_Mat
  • [2766_SalesDW].DW.FactOpportunity
  • [2766_SalesDW].DW.FactExchangeRates

For this, we need to create the following DWR views:
  • [2766_SalesDW].DWR.SorApprovalDetailsDaily_vw
  • [2766_SalesDW].DWR.OpportunityExtraDetailsDaily_vw
  • [2766_SalesDW].DWR.FactOpportunityConsolidatedTextAuxDaily_vw
  • [2766_SalesDW].DWR.FactOpportunityDaily_vw
  • [2766_SalesDW].DWR.FactExchangeRatesDaily_vw

Query to test:

---- STRUCTURE ------

SELECT * FROM [2766_SalesDW].DWR.SorApprovalDetailsDaily_vw with (nolock)
WHERE 1 = 0
SELECT * FROM [2766_SalesDW].DWR.OpportunityExtraDetailsDaily_vw  with (nolock)
WHERE 1 = 0
SELECT * FROM [2766_SalesDW].DWR.FactOpportunityConsolidatedTextAuxDaily_vw with (nolock)
WHERE 1 = 0
SELECT * FROM [2766_SalesDW].DWR.FactOpportunityDaily_vw with (nolock)
WHERE 1 = 0
SELECT * FROM [2766_SalesDW].DWR.FactExchangeRatesDaily_vw with (nolock)
WHERE 1 = 0

---- DATA ------

SELECT * FROM [2766_SalesDW].DWR.SorApprovalDetailsDaily_vw
WHERE DateKey IN (SELECT DateKey FROM [2766_SalesDW].DW.DimDate WHERE LastProcessingDateInd = 'Y')
SELECT * FROM [2766_SalesDW].DWR.OpportunityExtraDetailsDaily_vw
WHERE DateKey IN (SELECT DateKey FROM [2766_SalesDW].DW.DimDate WHERE LastProcessingDateInd = 'Y')
SELECT * FROM [2766_SalesDW].DWR.FactOpportunityConsolidatedTextAuxDaily_vw
WHERE DateKey IN (SELECT DateKey FROM [2766_SalesDW].DW.DimDate WHERE LastProcessingDateInd = 'Y')
SELECT * FROM [2766_SalesDW].DWR.FactOpportunityDaily_vw
WHERE DateKey IN (SELECT DateKey FROM [2766_SalesDW].DW.DimDate WHERE LastProcessingDateInd = 'Y')
SELECT * FROM [2766_SalesDW].DWR.FactExchangeRatesDaily_vw
WHERE DateKey IN (SELECT DateKey FROM [2766_SalesDW].DW.DimDate WHERE LastProcessingDateInd = 'Y')
Acceptance Criteria:
1- I see that [2766_SalesDW].DWR.SorApprovalDetails_vw is created on database.
2- I see that [2766_SalesDW].DWR.OpportunityExtraDetails_vw is created on database.
3- I see that [2766_SalesDW].DWR.FactOpportunityConsolidatedTextAux_vw is created on database.
4- I see that [2766_SalesDW].DWR.FactOpportunity_vw is created on database.
5- I see that [2766_SalesDW].DWR_FactExchangeRates_vw is created on database.

Title: Update/Add Metadata to each Proposal- PRD
Description:
As a content owner, I need to make sure that the proposals are tagged with the correct information so I can prioritize them in the search. The following metadata will be needed: CSGGroupCd (single value field), IndustryOfferingCd (multi-value field), IndustrySubSegmentCd (multi-value field), AllianceCd (multi-value field)

Implementation Details: 
For each proposal loaded in the vector db, ensure that the following fields are included:
CSGGroupCd (single value field)
IndustryOfferingCd (multi value field)
IndustrySubSegmentCd(multi value field)
Alliance(multi value field)

 

Using the OpportunityId which is part of the Proposal name, extract the OpportunityId
Call the MMS Endpoint https://mms-api.ciostage.accenture.com/stage/Opportunity-service/Opportunity('11334223’)
From the response body , write the values in each column as defined in the API Endpoint Details attached
Reference documents like fact sheets  should have the value “Priority”
Acceptance Criteria: All proposals should have Metadata values

Title: [DC] Account Plan - Strategic - Status and Validations - Part 3
Description:
As Account Plan user I want to see  update the Status section and some validations in Acount Plan (Part 3)
  • Add a validation that if AP Health Reflections and Actions questions are not completed, they cannot mark the SP as Completed.It should be automatically set to Complete once the 12 questions are completed
  • Add "Global Client Classification" and "Client Classification Attribute" from MC
  • Change "Type" to be calculated based on below logic and rename it as “Type of Client”. Read-only
    • Values
      • Platinums or G150
      • Diamonds
      • Emerging Diamonds or Foundations
    • As the field will be autocalculated, all the current values should be removed and autocalculated by using formulas.
    • Logic:
      • IF Account.G150 Client = true, then "Platinums or G150"
      • IF Account.Client Classification Attribute = "Platinum Diamond", then "Platinums or G150"
      • IF Account.Global Client Classification = "Diamond", then "Diamonds"
      • IF Account.Global Client Classification = "Foundation" , then "Emerging Diamonds or Foundations"
      • ELSE :Emerging Diamonds or Foundations

  • Level of Approval ¿Data conversion? - Read only
    • Values
      • Market & MU (Primary)
      • MU (Primary)
      • CG (Primary)
    • As the field will be autocalculated, all the current values should be removed and autocalculated by using formulas.
    • Logic
      • Switch "Type of Client"
        • Platinums or G150 -> Market & MU (Primary)
        • Diamonds -> MU (Primary)
        • Emerging Diamonds or Foundations -> CG (Primary)
Acceptance Criteria:
• The fields  "Global Client Classification" and "Client Classification Attribute" will be displayed in the AP from the MC
  • The field Type will be Type of Client and it will be autopopulated by following the new logic. Also, the logic of the Level of Approval
